BugFixes.Desc: When refreshing the invoices list, the invoice status is not updated after being paid via the Stripe billing system
The purchased subscription’s service plan cannot be updated if removed by the service hosting provider
The clustered solution is not updated when migrated to a different subscription service plan
The enable/disable Auto Pay option is available for the canceled subscriptions
An error occurs during the post-installation configuration of the gitlab/gitlab-ce Docker container
Incorrect validation for the passphrase when confirming the subscription migration
Incorrect full account limits are displayed in the dashboard’s Quotas & Pricing window
